node.doctext:
Or to drown my clothes, and say I was stripped. --- [Parolles]

[% return "The Treaty of Algeron prohibits your presence." if $USER->{node_id} == $HTMLVARS{'guest_user'}; # Allows cloaked users to uncloak, even if they don't have a cloak power. # Useful for fallen gods and the like. # Lord Brawl Nov 4, 2004 uncloak($USER, $VARS); my $str = '...like a new-born babe....'; %]
node.title: Decloaker
